mapper.select: select count(*) from( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 and (sunum=177 or sunum=178 or sunum=176 or sunum=140 or sunum=139 or sunum=138))a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum) s;

select count(*) from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1 and ((sunum<78 and sunum>50) or(sunum<103 and sunum>93)))a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum) s;

select count(c.hinum) from ( select a.img , a.hinum , a.title , a.price , a.times , subname from ( select img,e.hinum,title,price,times ,sunum ,regdate from experience_info e inner join house_img h on e.hinum=h.hinum where e.div_type=3 and ordernum=1)a inner join subDetail s on a.sunum=s.sunum order by a.regdate desc) c;
